targets.rawSql:
select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'REWET DRUM'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'SAMMYING MACHINE'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'SPLITTING'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'SHAVING MACHINE'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'RETANNING DRUM'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'SETTING OUT MACHINE'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'VACCUM'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'TOGGLING'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'BUFFING MACHINE'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'ROLLER COAT MACHINE'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'SPRAY MACHINE'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'CONTINUE EMBOSSING MACHINE'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'MILLING DRUM'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'MEANSURING MACHINE'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'REWET DRUM'
order by mast.time asc
select  description , id from machines where id = 1

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'REWET DRUM'
order by mast.time asc
select  description , id from machines where id = 1

select count(mach.id) as "Machines"
	from machines mach WHERE id <15

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Running with PO"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('5')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Running without PO"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('4')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Idle machine"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('2')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Stopped machine"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('3')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Offline"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('0','1')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()
